sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO OE1TNRESVEMTG ( MTG_ROOM_RES_ID , SCHDUL_SE_CODE , JOB_SE_CODE , MTG_NM , REPTIT_SE_CODE , MTG_START_DATE , MTG_END_DATE , MTG_BEGIN_TIME , MTG_END_TIME , CHARGER_ID , MTG_PLACE_ID , MTG_ATTEN_INFO , MTG_CN , ATCH_FILE_ID , REGISTER_ID , REGST_YMD , REPTIT_DFK ) VALUES ( #mtgRoomResId# , #schdulSeCode# , #jobSeCode# , #mtgNm# , #reptitSeCode# , #mtgStartDate# , #mtgEndDate# , #mtgBeginTime# , #mtgEndTime# , #chargerId# , #mtgPlaceId# , #mtgAttenInfo# , #mtgCn# , #atchFileId# , #registerId# , TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd') , #reptitDfk# )
INSERT INTO OE1TNMTGATTENINFO ( MTG_ROOM_RES_ID , MTG_ATTEN_ID ) VALUES ( #mtgRoomResId# , #mtgAttenId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OE1TNRESVEMTG SET SCHDUL_SE_CODE = #schdulSeCode# , JOB_SE_CODE = #jobSeCode# , MTG_NM = #mtgNm# , REPTIT_SE_CODE = #insRepeat# , MTG_START_DATE = #mtgStartDate# , MTG_END_DATE = #mtgEndDate# , MTG_BEGIN_TIME = #mtgBeginTime# , MTG_END_TIME = #mtgEndTime# , CHARGER_ID = #chargerId# , MTG_PLACE_ID = #mtgPlaceId# , MTG_ATTEN_INFO = #mtgAttenInfo# , MTG_CN = #mtgCn# , ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# , REGISTER_ID = #registerId# , REGST_YMD = TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd') , REPTIT_DFK = #reptitDfk# WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = #mtgRoomResId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.MTG_ROOM_RES_ID , A.SCHDUL_SE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1032' AND CODE = A.SCHDUL_SE_CODE ) AS SCHDUL_SE_CODE_NAME , A.JOB_SE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1033' AND CODE = A.JOB_SE_CODE ) AS JOB_SE_CODE_NAME , A.MTG_NM , A.REPTIT_SE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1034' AND CODE = A.REPTIT_SE_CODE ) AS REPTIT_SE_CODE_NAME , TO_DATE(A.MTG_START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MTG_START_DATE , TO_DATE(A.MTG_END_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MTG_END_DATE , substr(TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_START_DATE||A.MTG_BEGIN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI'), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'),1,16) AS MTG_BEGIN_TIME , substr(TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_END_DATE||A.MTG_END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI'), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'),1,16) AS MTG_END_TIME , A.CHARGER_ID , (SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID = A.CHARGER_ID)AS CHARGER_NAME , A.MTG_PLACE_ID , (SELECT MTG_PLACE_NM FROM OE1TNMTGRM WHERE MTG_PLACE_ID = A.MTG_PLACE_ID ) AS MTG_PLACE_ID_NAME , A.MTG_ATTEN_INFO , A.MTG_CN , (SELECT MAX(ATCH_FILE_ID) FROM OE1TNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = A.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS ATCH_FILE_ID , A.REGISTER_ID , (SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID = A.REGISTER_ID)AS REGISTER_NAME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( A.REGST_YMD, 'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS REGST_YMD , A.REPTIT_DFK , CASE A.REPTIT_DFK WHEN '0' THEN '매주일요일' WHEN '1' THEN '매주월요일' WHEN '2' THEN '매주화요일' WHEN '3' THEN '매주수요일' WHEN '4' THEN '매주목요일' WHEN '5' THEN '매주금요일' ELSE '매주토요일' END AS REPTIT_DFK_NAME FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG A WHERE A.MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = #mtgRoomResId#

SELECT REPTIT_DFK ,MTG_ROOM_RES_ID ,MTG_START_DATE ,MTG_BEGIN_TIME ,MTG_END_TIME ,MTG_PLACE_ID_NAME ,MTG_NM ,CHARGER_NAME ,MTG_ATTEN_ID||'외 '||MTG_ATTEN_count||'명' AS MTG_ATTEN_ID FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MTG_START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'D') AS REPTIT_DFK ,A.MTG_ROOM_RES_ID ,TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_START_DATE||A.MTG_BEGIN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI'), 'dd') AS MTG_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_START_DATE||A.MTG_BEGIN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI'), 'HH24:mi') AS MTG_BEGIN_TIME ,TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_END_DATE||A.MTG_END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI'), 'HH24:mi') AS MTG_END_TIME ,(SELECT MTG_PLACE_NM FROM OE1TNMTGRM WHERE MTG_PLACE_ID = A.MTG_PLACE_ID ) AS MTG_PLACE_ID_NAME ,'['||(SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1032' AND CODE = A.SCHDUL_SE_CODE )||']'||A.MTG_NM AS MTG_NM ,(SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID = A.CHARGER_ID)AS CHARGER_NAME ,(SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID =(SELECT MTG_ATTEN_ID FROM OE1TNMTGATTENINFO WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = A.MTG_ROOM_RES_ID and rownum=1)) AS MTG_ATTEN_ID ,(SELECT count(MTG_ATTEN_ID)-1 FROM OE1TNMTGATTENINFO WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = A.MTG_ROOM_RES_ID) AS MTG_ATTEN_count FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG A WHERE 1=1
A.SCHDUL_SE_CODE = #searchSchdulSeCode#
TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(A.MTG_START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYY') = #searchYear#
TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(A.MTG_START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'MM') = #searchMonth#
ORDER BY MTG_START_DATE ASC )C

SELECT A.MTG_ROOM_RES_ID , A.SCHDUL_SE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1032' AND CODE = A.SCHDUL_SE_CODE ) AS SCHDUL_SE_CODE_NAME , A.JOB_SE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1033' AND CODE = A.JOB_SE_CODE ) AS JOB_SE_CODE_NAME , A.MTG_NM , A.REPTIT_SE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1034' AND CODE = A.REPTIT_SE_CODE ) AS REPTIT_SE_CODE_NAME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( A.MTG_START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MTG_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( A.MTG_END_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MTG_END_DATE , substr(A.MTG_BEGIN_TIME,1,2) AS START_HH , substr(A.MTG_BEGIN_TIME,3,2) AS START_MM , substr(A.MTG_END_TIME,1,2) AS FINISH_HH , substr(A.MTG_END_TIME,3,2) AS FINISH_MM , A.CHARGER_ID , (SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID = A.CHARGER_ID)AS CHARGER_NAME , A.MTG_PLACE_ID , (SELECT MTG_PLACE_NM FROM OE1TNMTGRM WHERE MTG_PLACE_ID = A.MTG_PLACE_ID ) AS MTG_PLACE_ID_NAME , A.MTG_ATTEN_INFO , A.MTG_CN , (SELECT MAX(ATCH_FILE_ID) FROM OE1TNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = A.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS ATCH_FILE_ID , A.REGISTER_ID , (SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID = A.REGISTER_ID)AS REGISTER_NAME , TO_DATE( A.REGST_YMD, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS REGST_YMD , A.REPTIT_DFK , CASE A.REPTIT_DFK WHEN '0' THEN '매주일요일' WHEN '1' THEN '매주월요일' WHEN '2' THEN '매주화요일' WHEN '3' THEN '매주수요일' WHEN '4' THEN '매주목요일' WHEN '5' THEN '매주금요일' ELSE '매주토요일' END AS REPTIT_DFK_NAME FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG A WHERE A.MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = #mtgRoomResId#

SELECT A.MTG_ATTEN_ID AS MTG_ATTEN_ID , (SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID = A.MTG_ATTEN_ID)AS MTG_ATTEN_NAME FROM OE1TNMTGATTENINFO A WHERE A.MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = #mtgRoomResId# ORDER BY MTG_ATTEN_NAME
SELECT MTG_PLACE_ID , MTG_PLACE_NM AS MTG_PLACE_ID_NAME FROM OE1TNMTGRM WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY MTG_PLACE_ID_NAME

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.MBER_ID AS MNGR_ID , A.MBER_NM AS MNGR_NM , A.PSTINST_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD X WHERE X.CODE_ID = 'OE1038' AND X.CODE = TRIM(A.PSTINST_CODE)) PSTINST_NAME , A.GROUP_ID , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD X WHERE X.CODE_ID = 'OE1039' AND X.CODE = TRIM(A.GROUP_ID)) GROUP_NAME FROM OE1TNUSERINFO A ) C WHERE 1=1
PSTINST_NAME LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
GROUP_NAME LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
MNGR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
ORDER BY MNGR_NM ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE 1=1
SCHDUL_SE_CODE = #searchSchdulSeCode#
TO_CHAR( MTG_START_DATE, 'yyyy') = #searchYear#
TO_CHAR( MTG_START_DATE, 'mm') = #searchMonth#

SELECT A.SCHDUL_SE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1032' AND CODE = A.SCHDUL_SE_CODE ) AS SCHDUL_SE_CODE_NAME , A.JOB_SE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1033' AND CODE = A.JOB_SE_CODE ) AS JOB_SE_CODE_NAME ,to_date(A.MTG_START_DATE||A.MTG_BEGIN_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi') AS MTG_START_DATE ,to_char(to_date(A.MTG_END_DATE||A.MTG_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi'),'HH24:mi') AS MTG_END_DATE ,A.MTG_NM , A.MTG_PLACE_ID , (SELECT MTG_PLACE_NM FROM OE1TNMTGRM WHERE MTG_PLACE_ID = A.MTG_PLACE_ID ) AS MTG_PLACE_ID_NAME ,A.REPTIT_SE_CODE ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1034' AND CODE = A.REPTIT_SE_CODE ) AS REPTIT_SE_CODE_NAME , A.CHARGER_ID , (SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID = A.CHARGER_ID)AS CHARGER_NAME FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG A WHERE 1=1 and (TO_CHAR(to_date(#mtgStartDate#||#mtgBeginTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')+1/(24*60*60),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') between TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_START_DATE||A.MTG_BEGIN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_END_DATE||A.MTG_END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') OR TO_CHAR(to_date(#mtgEndDate#||#mtgEndTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')-1/(24*60*60),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') between TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_START_DATE||A.MTG_BEGIN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_END_DATE||A.MTG_END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ) and A.MTG_PLACE_ID = #mtgPlaceId#

SELECT A.SCHDUL_SE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1032' AND CODE = A.SCHDUL_SE_CODE ) AS SCHDUL_SE_CODE_NAME , A.JOB_SE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1033' AND CODE = A.JOB_SE_CODE ) AS JOB_SE_CODE_NAME ,to_date(A.MTG_START_DATE||A.MTG_BEGIN_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi') AS MTG_START_DATE ,to_char(to_date(A.MTG_END_DATE||A.MTG_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi'),'HH24:mi') AS MTG_END_DATE ,A.MTG_NM , A.MTG_PLACE_ID , (SELECT MTG_PLACE_NM FROM OE1TNMTGRM WHERE MTG_PLACE_ID = A.MTG_PLACE_ID ) AS MTG_PLACE_ID_NAME ,A.REPTIT_SE_CODE ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1034' AND CODE = A.REPTIT_SE_CODE ) AS REPTIT_SE_CODE_NAME , A.CHARGER_ID , (SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_ID = A.CHARGER_ID)AS CHARGER_NAME FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG A WHERE 1=1 and (TO_CHAR(to_date(#mtgStartDate#||#mtgBeginTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')+1/(24*60*60),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') between TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_START_DATE||A.MTG_BEGIN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_END_DATE||A.MTG_END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') OR TO_CHAR(to_date(#mtgEndDate#||#mtgEndTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')-1/(24*60*60),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') between TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_START_DATE||A.MTG_BEGIN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and TO_CHAR( to_date(A.MTG_END_DATE||A.MTG_END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ) and A.MTG_PLACE_ID = #mtgPlaceId# and A.MTG_ROOM_RES_ID != #mtgRoomResId#

SELECT mtg.MTG_PLACE_NM as MTG_PLACE_NM, mtg.MTG_PLACE_ID as MTG_PLACE_ID, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."0800" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP0800, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."0830" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP0830, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."0900" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP0900, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."0930" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP0930, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1000" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1000, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1030" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1030, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1100" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1100, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1130" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1130, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1200" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1200, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1230" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1230, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1300" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1300, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1330" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1330, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1400" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1400, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1430" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1430, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1500" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1500, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1530" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1530, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1600" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1600, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1630" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1630, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1700" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1700, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1730" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1730, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1800" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1800, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1830" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1830, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1900" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1900, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."1930" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP1930, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."2000" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP2000, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."2030" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP2030, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."2100" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP2100, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."2130" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP2130, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."2200" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP2200, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."2230" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP2230, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."2300" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP2300, NVL((SELECT MTG_ROOM_RES_ID||MTG_NM FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_ROOM_RES_ID = res."2330" ),'0') as RESVE_TEMP2330 from OE1TNMTGRM mtg left join ( select NVL(MTG_PLACE_ID,'') AS MTG_PLACE_ID, case when 0800 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "0800", case when 0830 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "0830", case when 0900 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "0900", case when 0930 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "0930", case when 1000 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1000", case when 1030 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1030", case when 1100 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1100", case when 1130 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1130", case when 1200 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1200", case when 1230 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1230", case when 1300 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1300", case when 1330 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1330", case when 1400 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1400", case when 1430 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1430", case when 1500 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1500", case when 1530 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1530", case when 1600 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1600", case when 1630 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1630", case when 1700 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1700", case when 1730 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1730", case when 1800 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1800", case when 1830 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1830", case when 1900 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1900", case when 1930 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "1930", case when 2000 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "2000", case when 2030 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "2030", case when 2100 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "2100", case when 2130 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "2130", case when 2200 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "2200", case when 2230 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "2230", case when 2300 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "2300", case when 2330 between MTG_BEGIN_TIME and (MTG_END_TIME-1) then MTG_ROOM_RES_ID else '' end AS "2330" FROM OE1TNRESVEMTG WHERE MTG_START_DATE = #mtgStartDate#) res on res.MTG_PLACE_ID = mtg.MTG_PLACE_ID ORDER BY MTG_PLACE_NM
